1-1.description: Our very own CRC-20 governance token. Use this precious currency to stake, earn D.G.Pal eggs, mint NFTs, and access exclusive content!

1-2.description: The common currency used by D.G.Pals, Panterra Opals can be traded with other Explorers and used for a wide range of activities.

1-3.description: A badge of glory for those who spare no expense, whether it be offence or defence. Gather enough and find favour with the Dark Sentinels.

1-4.description: A badge of honour for those who burn the midnight oil and daily make that uphill toil. Gather enough and find favour with the Light Sentinels.

2-1.description: A token that gleams with opportunity. Use it to spin the Wheel of Fortune and test your luck. Maybe you'll get something valuable!

2-2.description: A mysterious unearthed cache that could contain Equipment, Materials, Crystals, Gems, or Runes. There's only one way to find out what's inside…

2-3.description: Looks like Forgetemper left his things lying around again... This unmarked chest could contain Crystals, Gems, or if you’re super lucky, a piece of Epic or Rare Equipment.

2-4.description: A sturdy chest made by Forgetemper himself. Open it to find Crystals, Gems, or quite possibly, a piece of Epic or Rare Equipment.

2-5.description: This chest seems to have been crafted with great care, just like the piece of Rare Equipment inside it. What will you find? Weapon, Helm, Garb, Boots or Ring?

2-6.description: What a chest indeed! Such stunning ornamentation! Surely, there must be a piece of Epic Equipment inside. What could it be? Weapon, Helm, Garb, Boots or Ring?

2-7.description: Just feel all that raw power radiating from this magnificent chest! There is definitely a piece of Legendary Equipment in here. Only one question remains: Weapon, Helm, Garb, Boots or Ring?

2-8.description: A random mix of Wood, Metal, or Stone freshly bundled by hard-working D.G.Pals. What could you create with this?

2-9.description: A handy pack of Wood, Metal, or Stone to jump-start your crafting.

2-10.description: A sizable haul of Wood, Metal, or Stone from the bountiful land of Panterra, for all your crafting needs.

2-11.description: A gigantic pile of Wood, Metal, or Stone delivered right to your doorstep. Time for some serious construction work!

2-12.description: What an odd-looking chest! How curious, how very peculiar. From where did it come? And what exactly does it hold? Only one way to find out…

2-13.description: Stand an exciting chance to win the Seabreacher X and its accompanying NFT Mount - the Azuroras ATV that will appear in DGP: Plaza! Refer to Discord and Twitter for the official draw date.

2-14.description: Looks like Forgetemper left his things lying around again... This unmarked chest could contain various upgrade materials or if you’re super lucky, a piece of Rare or Epic Equipment.

2-15.description: Ooooo… The Classic Arena Crate that every Arena challenger needs. Contains various upgrade materials [T1-T6] and oh, the slightest chance of Equipment.  (Earn 1 Light Sentinel Badge.)

2-16.description: Ready to up your game? Then this Deluxe Arena Crate is perfect for you! Contains a significant amount of upgrade materials [T1-T8] and even a small chance of Equipment!  (Receive 10 Dark Sentinel Badges.)

2-17.description: Aspiring Legends, this one’s for you! Gain an edge over your opponents with this Premium Arena Crate and take the competition by storm! Contains quality upgrade materials [T6-T10] and a higher chance of Equipment.  (Receive 50 Dark Sentinel Badges.)

2-18.description: Ah hah! This Classic Island Crate is bound to come in handy for your adventure. Contains various mystical resources.

2-19.description: Clearing rifts can be real rough! Increase your odds with this Deluxe Island Crate! Contains a significant amount of mystical resources.

2-20.description: Calling all avid adventurers! Unleash your full potential with this Premium Island Crate! Contains quality mystical resources that will help you and your Clan emerge victorious!

3-1.description: This is a random D.G.Egg. It can be hatched and certified in D.G.P: New World as a random D.G.Pal NFT.

3-2.description: This is a Rare Space D.G.Egg. This egg will be hatched and minted into an NFT containing a Rare Space type D.G.Pal.

3-3.description: This is a Rare Elemental D.G.Egg. This egg will be hatched and minted into an NFT containing a Rare Elemental type D.G.Pal.

3-19.description: This is a random Nightmare D.G.Egg. It can be hatched and certified in D.G.P: New World as a random Nightmare D.G.Pal NFT.

9-1.description: A swirling purple mist enshrouds this Rune. How will it enhance your Equipment stats?

10-1.description: Present this official ticket to the New World Office when your D.G.Pal is ready to be certified as an NFT. This will waive the usual $OPL fee required.

10-2.description: An invitation to trade... That's all it says on the back.

10-3.description: An invitation to trade... That's all it says on the back.

10-7.description: Golly! These are unbelievably difficult to obtain! Well done, you! Head over to Impossible Plaza to redeem it for an exclusive NFT Mount!

10-8.description: What could these possibly be exchanged for? Collect as many as you can and find out in Impossible Plaza!

15-1.description: A good ole doughnut that increases the EXP of any one Pal by 250.

15-2.description: Glazed with a milky vanilla coating, this doughnut increases the EXP of any one Pal by 1000.

15-3.description: Topped with rainbow sprinkles, this doughnut increases the EXP of any one Pal by 2000.

15-4.description: A potent shot of coffee that fast-tracks any one Pal to Level 15.

15-5.description: Seductively smooth coffee that fast-tracks any one Pal to Level 30.

16-1.description: Whoever drew these up is either a genius or has a screw loose. Who could possibly decipher those scribbles? Then again, one never knows in Impossible Plaza.
